data.lyric:
[ti:Hawái (Remix)]
[ar:Maluma/The Weeknd]
[al:Hawái (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hawái (Remix) - Maluma/The Weeknd
[00:00.26]Lyrics by：Juan Luis Londoño/Bryan Lezcano/Kevin Jiménez/Kevyn Cruz/Édgar Barrera/René Cano/Miky La Sensa/Johan Espinosa/Andrés Uribe/Juan Camilo Vargas/Abel Tesfaye "The Weeknd"
[00:01.79]Composed by：Juan Luis Londoño/Bryan Lezcano/Kevin Jiménez/Kevyn Cruz/Édgar Barrera/René Cano/Miky La Sensa/Johan Espinosa/Andrés Uribe/Juan Camilo Vargas/Abel Tesfaye "The Weeknd"
[00:03.16]The Weeknd：
[00:03.18]Yeah
[00:04.71]So now he's your heaven
[00:06.53]Oh yeah
[00:08.13]You're lying to yourself and him to make me jealous
[00:12.05]Oh no
[00:13.46]You put on such an act when you're sleepin' together
[00:18.81]All this 'cause I said I don't want marriage
[00:22.78]Marriage
[00:23.35]I don't want marriage
[00:25.80]Hey
[00:25.97]I'd rather go half on a baby
[00:29.42]'Cause at least I know that it's not temporary
[00:33.56]Temporary
[00:35.08]And at least we'll share something that's real
[00:39.39]Oh yeah
[00:40.24]I can tell that you're just tryna feel
[00:44.64]Oh no
[00:45.05]The Weeknd/Maluma：
[00:45.51]Puede que no te haga falta na' aparentemente na'
[00:51.85]Hawái de vacacione' mis felicitacione'
[00:57.25]Muy lindo en Instagram lo que posteas
[01:01.09]Oh yeah
[01:02.05]Pa' que yo vea cómo te va pa' que yo vea
[01:06.42]Hah
[01:07.00]Puede que no te haga falta na' aparentemente na'
[01:13.20]Hawái de vacaciones
[01:15.71]Ah
[01:16.00]Mis felicitaciones
[01:18.39]Ah
[01:18.68]Muy lindo en Instagram lo que posteas
[01:22.49]Huh
[01:23.38]Pa' que yo vea cómo te va de bien pero te haces mal
[01:28.35]Porque el amor no se compra con na'
[01:30.55]Maluma：
[01:30.99]Miéntele a todos tus seguidore'
[01:32.88]Dile que los tiempo' de ahora son mejore'
[01:35.50]No creo que cuando te llame me ignores
[01:38.79]Si después de mí ya no habrán más amores
[01:41.66]Tú y yo fuimo' uno
[01:43.47]Lo hacíamo' en ayuna' antes del desayuno
[01:46.08]Fumábamo' la hookah y te pasaba el humo
[01:48.82]Y ahora en esta guerra no gana ninguno
[01:51.48]Si me preguntas nadie tiene culpa
[01:54.12]A vece' los problemas a uno se le juntan
[01:56.81]Déjame hablar porfa no me interrumpas
[01:59.53]Si te hice algo malo entonces discúlpame
[02:03.48]La gente te lo va a creer actúas bien ese papel
[02:07.58]Yeah
[02:07.86]Baby pero no eres feliz con él
[02:10.38]The Weeknd/Maluma：
[02:10.84]Puede que no te haga falta na' aparentemente na'
[02:17.13]Hawái de vacacione'
[02:19.78]Yeah
[02:19.99]Mis felicitacione'
[02:22.53]Muy lindo en Instagram lo que posteas
[02:26.47]Oh no
[02:27.37]Pa' que yo vea cómo te va pa' que yo vea
[02:31.79]Hah
[02:32.29]Puede que no te haga falta na' aparentemente na'
[02:38.52]Hawái de vacaciones
[02:41.15]Ah
[02:41.32]Mis felicitaciones
[02:43.79]Ah
[02:43.98]Muy lindo en Instagram lo que posteas
[02:47.85]Posteas
[02:48.80]Pa' que yo vea cómo te va de bien pero te haces mal
[02:53.39]Yeah
[02:53.60]Porque el amor no se compra con na'
[02:55.73]So now he's your heaven
[02:58.67]You're lying to yourself and him to make me jealous
[03:02.29]This is the remix
[03:04.00]You put on such an act when you're sleepin' together
[03:06.59]The Weeknd
[03:09.43]Papi Juancho
[03:09.84]All this 'cause I said I don't want marriage
[03:11.99]Maluma baby
[03:14.15]I don't want marriage
data.trans:
[ti:Hawái (Remix)]
[ar:Maluma/The Weeknd]
[al:Hawái (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.26]//
[00:01.79]//
[00:03.16]//
[00:03.18]//
[00:04.71]所以现在他就是你的那片天
[00:06.53]//
[00:08.13]你欺骗自己 欺骗他 就为了看我妒火中烧的模样
[00:12.05]//
[00:13.46]你们同床共枕时 你享受的样子太装模作样
[00:18.81]今天这个局面的发生 不过就是因为我一句我不想结婚
[00:22.78]结婚
[00:23.35]我不想结婚
[00:25.80]//
[00:25.97]我宁愿跟我的爱人生个孩子
[00:29.42]因为至少我知道亲生骨肉永远无法分割
[00:33.56]分割
[00:35.08]至少我们可以共同拥有某种真实的事物
[00:39.39]//
[00:40.24]我可以感觉到你只是想要享受被爱的感受
[00:44.64]//
[00:45.05]//
[00:45.51]或许你什么也不需要 显然根本就不需要
[00:51.85]在夏威夷度着假 我该对你说声恭喜
[00:57.25]你发在Instagram上的照片是很亮眼
[01:01.09]//
[01:02.05]这样我就能清楚看见
[01:06.42]//
[01:07.00]或许你什么也不需要 显然根本就不需要
[01:13.20]在夏威夷度着假
[01:15.71]//
[01:16.00]我该对你说声恭喜
[01:18.39]//
[01:18.68]你发在Instagram上的照片是很亮眼
[01:22.49]//
[01:23.38]这样就能让我看见 你本可以做好 但却弄得一团糟
[01:28.35]因为爱无法用任何事物来衡量
[01:30.55]//
[01:30.99]你对你的追求者撒了谎
[01:32.88]告诉他你已经走出情伤
[01:35.50]我不觉得你会忽略掉我 去接他的电话
[01:38.79]如果在我之后 你没有再坠入爱河
[01:41.66]你我天生一对
[01:43.47]在早饭之前 空着肚子我们也要亲热缠绵
[01:46.08]我们一起吞云吐雾 烟雾缭绕在你身边
[01:48.82]现在我们之间战斗打响 没有人站在胜利的一方
[01:51.48]如果你来质问我 其实谁都没有错
[01:54.12]有时问题会一个一个堆积
[01:56.81]让我来说 不要打断我
[01:59.53]如果我有什么不对的地方 请原谅我
[02:03.48]人们都会相信你的说辞 你这个角色扮演得很好
[02:07.58]//
[02:07.86]宝贝 但在他身边 你并不快乐
[02:10.38]//
[02:10.84]或许你什么也不需要 显然根本就不需要
[02:17.13]在夏威夷度着假
[02:19.78]//
[02:19.99]我该对你说声恭喜
[02:22.53]你发在Instagram上的照片是很亮眼
[02:26.47]//
[02:27.37]这样我就能清楚看见
[02:31.79]///
[02:32.29]或许你什么也不需要 显然根本就不需要
[02:38.52]在夏威夷度着假
[02:41.15]//
[02:41.32]我该对你说声恭喜
[02:43.79]//
[02:43.98]你发在Instagram上的照片是很亮眼
[02:47.85]你发的照片
[02:48.80]这样就能让我看见 你本可以做好 但却弄得一团糟
[02:53.39]//
[02:53.60]因为爱无法用任何事物来衡量
[02:55.73]所以现在他就是你的那片天
[02:58.67]你欺骗自己 欺骗他 就为了看我妒火中烧的模样
[03:02.29]这是混音版本
[03:04.00]你们同床共枕时 你享受的样子太装模作样
[03:06.59]//
[03:09.43]老大 Juancho
[03:09.84]今天这个局面的发生 不过就是因为我一句我不想结婚
[03:11.99]Maluma 宝贝
[03:14.15]我不想结婚
